ygData.subject: Wisperlings and Tailfang
ygData.msgSnippet: A little lost on something involving two seperate quests in Shar Vahl and Shadow Weavers Thicket. Question is at the end of the quest for the frost weavers
ygData.messageBody:
A little lost on something involving two seperate
quests in Shar Vahl and Shadow Weavers Thicket. Question
is at the end of the quest for the frost weavers
shield,Spiritist Ragnar mentions that the whisperling inhabiting
the sheild tells him of another wisperling named
Scorpialis. Scorpialis is the name of the weapon from the
TailFang quest which I also completed. Any one know if
Ragnar is just giving information on the TailFang quest
itself or if their is more involved in that quest if you
give him Scorpialis?
